subSubSection.paragraph:

Distribution in Iran .
N, NE, E, and Central Iran ( Fig. 30A ).

Comment. In the distribution map ( Fig. 30A ), the following locality, “ 12 km S of Käzän” ( Fars Prov. )” has not been included. Käzän is possibly the misspelling of Kazerun but owing to uncertainty, it was excluded.
